caption.center: COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA, Respondent v. DARRYL BUCK, Petitioner.

court.center: Supreme Court of Pennsylvania, Middle District.

opinion.posture: No. 226 MAL 2002, Petition for Allowance of Appeal from Order of the Superior Court.
opinion.opinion_text: AND NOW, this 14th day of August 2002, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is denied.
